overview:
Kerry Lyons manages the House Party brand, online and off. Kerry joined House Party in 2011, determined to strengthen internally what the company excels at doing for its clients — building brand and driving sales — by infusing the House Party personality into all client and consumer touch points.

Before joining House Party, Kerry’s passion for building brands grew over a decade at some of New York’s leading advertising agencies, where she worked on some the world’s best-known brands, including Kellogg’s, British Airways and Johnson & Johnson.

As the agency and media landscape evolved, Kerry moved into the ad targeting space, joining Mindset Media, a digital media start-up focused on psychographic targeting. There she wore many hats in research, sales and marketing while helping the Mindset Media brand and revenue grow.

Today Kerry feels she’s found the perfect home in House Party, a company that combines her passion for building brands with an entrepreneurial spirit.

In her spare time, Kerry enjoys reading, writing, running and retrievers…not always in that order. A graduate of Villanova University, she lives in Westchester with her husband and five children, including identical triplet boys.
